'''October, 18th 2007 meeting Minutes'''

'''Weekly Meeting of the New Mexico Ubuntu LoCo'''

'''Members Present''' 
* David Thomas dthomasdigital
* protonchris
* tritium
* don2718
* inchworm
* wesley
* gcleric
* celegarm

'''Others Present'''
* some lurkers but no one chimed in

'''Proceedings'''

Meeting called to order at 7:30pm by Member David Thomas

'''Topics Discussed''' 

With Gutsy Gibbon being released today the meeting was called to order a little early, we talked about the up coming Release party for Gutsy Gibbon as well as Linux Gaming "Quake Wars Demo for Linux is out". Discussions on MythTV took place and of course Gutsy Gibbon testing.

It was also decided by tritium our founding member that we should apply for official status

Meeting dismissed at 9:30pm

'''Assessment of Meeting'''

Great meeting the best yet, a record number of members took part.

Meeting minutes submitted by David Thomas
